attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tony Mcnulty MP has to be found a job outside of parliment as he has no competance as an MP. 
His arguments and understanding of his role leaves a lot to be desired and it is evident when being questioned.

He is currently employment minister and has no clues on how his resistance to an acknowledgemnt that there is a  failure of government to protect and help both the unemployed and the employed which is helping to destroy this countries industry.
